definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameter_string"><field name="param">help</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">help</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"/explode <location> <explosion power> <x> <y> <z>","color":"#FFFF00"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"/explode <here> <explosion power>","color":"#FFFF00"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"/explode <help>","color":"#FFFF00"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
